mapper.select: select B.status from borrower B where B.user_id = #{userId} and B.is_deleted = 0

select * from borrower B where
(B.name like CONCAT('%' , #{keyword} , '%') OR B.mobile like CONCAT('%' , #{keyword} , '%') OR B.id_card like CONCAT('%' , #{keyword} , '%'))

select B.id,B.user_id,B.name,B.id_card,B.mobile,B.sex,B.age,B.education,B.is_marry, B.industry,B.income,B.return_source,B.contacts_name,B.contacts_mobile,B.contacts_relation, B.status,B.create_time,B.update_time,B.is_deleted from borrower B where B.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update borrower B set B.status = #{status},B.update_time = now() where B.id = #{id} and B.is_deleted = 0
